overview: The summer sunshine is here and that means it’s open season on fucking California’s hottest tanned twinks! There’s plenty of unscripted blond-on-blond action as Casey Tanner gives sandy blond twink Kyle Ross and platinum blond party boy Max Carter road head while Jessie Montgomery and his golden locks love the live action anal from Christian and Max in one of Helix Studios’ highest rated scenes ever! If you wish they all could be California Boys then this is your lucky day!
title: California Boys
